title: Obama Signs Executive Order Requiring Loser of Presidential Election to Leave Country?
subtitle: A satirical item about President Obama's mandating that the loser of the 2016 election leave the country forever was mistaken for real news by some social media users.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Obama signed an executive order mandating the loser of the 2016 election forever leave the country on 9 November 2016.
